name: itsMagondu.GitHub.io
body:
### Magondu Njenga.

I have been coding since 2009 while an undergrad student. Now I am an MSC student and still coding :-( I prefer Django and Python but always keen to learn new stuff. Interested in Application scalability and distributed systems. Avid follower of Christ. Micah 6:8
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
